title: The Best Drink to Switch it Up - Follow the Liter
description:
Welcome to our newest show Follow the Liter, where we teach you how to make fancy drinks that will impress your friends. This week, the Kentucky Buck!

Get a cocktail named after you here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny
